description: This file defines a React functional component 'Arc' that renders an animated elliptical arc using SVG. It utilizes React hooks such as useState and integrates with the remotion library for video rendering. The component dynamically creates a gradient fill and manages SVG attributes to animate the arc based on progress and rotation parameters.

methods.name: getCircumferenceOfArc
methods.description: Calculates the circumference of an elliptical arc based on x and y radii.
